page.title: 02SUDBURY VILLAGE
page.content: {Sudbury village}is well-known by lots of people. It is quite small and very quiet. The village is shaped like a cross. The roads that form the cross are{Gib {Lane, School Lane}and the{Main Road. There is a{by-pass,}just on the outskirts of the main village which takes all the traffic out of the village itself. There are two{shops,}the{butcher's and the{post office.}The butcher's is owned by Mr.Wild who also has a {slaughter house}down School Lane. The{school}is down the lane. It was built in 1832 and is still being used today.Also down School Lane is a{forge which makes excavator buckets. There is a{blacksmith's}right next to the forge in the old gasworks. It is owned by Norman Lunnon. contd.....
